node.text: Today is World Kindness Day, a day to recognize the power of kindness and compassion. As Instagram has grown into a community of more than 800M, it is our responsibility to keep Instagram the kindest, most welcoming community online and offline. That’s why, over the last few months, we’ve been turning walls in cities around the world into colorful murals inspiring #kindcomments. One of these murals was created by artist Lakwena Maciver, whose work includes painting and large scale public works that explore mythology, philosophy, and faith. You can find her mural at the Houston Bowery Wall in New York City, where you can take a photo or video and share a #kindcomments to make someone’s day. Photo of @lakwena by @portraits
